data.title: NEWS: Marca MP to Perform Halftime Show for Match Against LAFC at Levi’s Stadium on May 4
data.meta_description:
SAN JOSE, Calif. – The San Jose Earthquakes today announced that musical group Marca MP will perform at halftime of the San Jose Earthquakes’ regular-season match vs. Los Angeles Football Club at Levi’s Stadium on Saturday, May 4 (4:30 p.m. PT), presented by Audi.
Marca MP is a California-based Regional
data.text:
SAN JOSE, Calif. â The San Jose Earthquakes today announced that musical group Marca MP will perform at halftime of the San Jose Earthquakesâ regular-season match vs. Los Angeles Football Club at Leviâs Stadium on Saturday, May 4 (4:30 p.m. PT), presented by Audi.Â

Marca MP is a California-based Regional Mexican group known for their banda, mariachi, and ranchera styles. Founded in 2018 in Modesto, Calif., Marca MP is currently comprised of Pedro âEl Chatoâ Vargas, Esteban Salcedo, DiÃ³genes BojÃ³rquez, and Julio Torres.Â

The award-winning group boast 6.7 million monthly listeners on Spotify and were named best collaboration at the 2023 Latin American Music Awards as well as the 2022 Premios de la Radio for their single âYa Acaboâ. It is also known for Billboard-charting hits âRecuerdaâ and âEl GÃ¼eroâ, and for notable collaborations with popular artists Becky G, Grupo Firme, and Banda RenovaciÃ³n

In addition to the halftime musical performance, the Quakes will open Leviâs Stadium to full capacity and host a Fan Fest featuring Mexican National Team legend Oswaldo SÃ¡nchez, Reynoso and Soltero of The Give N Go Podcast, social media sensations San Jose Foos, and other influencers and celebrities. There will also be a live performance from San Jose natives SueÃ±atrÃ³n, food celebrating Mexican culture, and more. Additional information will be announced later.

An exclusive presale for Earthquakes Season Ticket Holders began on Tuesday, Jan. 9, at 10 a.m. PT, and tickets will be made available to the general public on Thursday, Jan. 11, at 10 a.m. PT. Tickets can be purchased via Ticketmaster.com. Tickets for groups of 10 or more can be purchased by calling the Earthquakesâ Front Office at (408) 556-7700 or by clicking here. To learn more about Leviâs suite purchases, please click here or email suites@sjearthquakes.com.
